title: Fix Tasks Page Loading Issue

requirements.text: Investigate and fix the issue preventing tasks from loading when the Tasks page is clicked. Verify that the tasks query is executing correctly, error boundaries are catching failures, and loading states are properly handled in TasksPage.tsx.

quotes: while click tasks ,it is not loading

acceptanceCriteria: Tasks page loads successfully when navigated to from the navigation menu
Task list displays data or shows appropriate loading/error states
No JavaScript errors in console when accessing Tasks page
Page responds within 3 seconds of click

requirements.text: Add error logging and diagnostics to the Tasks page component to capture and report any data fetching failures, including query status, error messages, and network request details.
acceptanceCriteria: Console logs show clear error messages if tasks query fails
Loading states are visible to user during data fetch
Error boundary catches and displays any runtime errors

requirements.text: Verify that the public tasks query endpoint (publicGetTasks) is accessible and functioning correctly, ensuring the backend canister is responding to requests.
acceptanceCriteria: publicGetTasks endpoint returns task data without errors
Backend canister responds to health check queries
No 503 or 500 errors when calling backend methods

constraints: Do not modify useInternetIdentity.ts or useActor.ts hooks
Preserve existing public API access patterns for unauthenticated users
Maintain compatibility with current task data structure and types
